title: How to convert to float
content:
```
.rdata:00414704 __real@c0800000 dd 0C0800000h

```
How to convert this value 0C0800000h to float point number?

answers_data.content: ALT-D, then Float. (Or Double, or Packed Real.)

There are two ways:
